languages.text: "Послание самого Девейна!" {n}Глаза историка разгораются.{/n} "Этого великого мечтателя и визионера! Я должен был догадаться. Девейн страстно любил свой замысел, неудивительно, что он лично курировал создание буклета о нем, и сам поместил туда загадку для пытливых. Он словно бы заговорил со мной сквозь века, чтобы указать путь сюда! Я... я чувствую, что мне оказана честь".

"A message from Dewain himself!" {n}His eyes light up.{/n} "The great dreamer and visionary! I should have guessed. Dewain was passionate about his designs — it's no wonder he personally oversaw the creation of the booklet that described it and even included a puzzle for the keen-minded. It's as if he spoke to me through the ages back then just to lead me here! I... I feel I've been granted an honour."
languages.original_text: "Послание самого Девейна!" {n}Глаза историка разгораются.{/n} "Этого великого мечтателя и визионера! Я должен был догадаться. Девейн страстно любил свой замысел, неудивительно, что он лично курировал создание буклета о нем, и сам поместил туда загадку для пытливых. Он словно бы заговорил со мной сквозь века, чтобы указать путь сюда! Я... я чувствую, что мне оказана честь".

Dewain was passionate about his designs — it's no wonder he personally oversaw the creation of the booklet that described it and even put in a puzzle for the keen-minded. It's as if he spoke to me through the ages back then just to lead me here! I... I feel I've been granted an honour."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: 「ドウェイン本人からのメッセージ！」{n}彼の目が輝いた。{/n}「偉大な夢想家であり稀代の空想家の彼が残したのか！やはりそうでしたか。ドウェインは自分の設計に情熱を注いでいました――その詳細を記した小冊子の作成を自ら監督し、熱心な人のためになぞなぞまで用意したのも不思議ではありません。まるで私をここに導くために、彼が時代を超えて私に語りかけてきたかのような気持ちです！こんな…こんな光栄なことはありません」
languages.original_text: "A message from Dewain himself!" {n}His eyes light up.{/n} "The great dreamer and visionary! I should have guessed. Dewain was passionate about his designs — it's no wonder he personally oversaw the creation of the booklet that described it and even included a puzzle for the keen-minded. It's as if he spoke to me through the ages back then just to lead me here! I... I feel I've been granted an honour."

traits.locale_text: 「ドウェイン本人からのメッセージ！」{n}彼の目が輝いた。{/n}「偉大な夢想家であり稀代の空想家の彼が残したのか！やはりそうでしたか。ドウェインは自分の設計に情熱を注いでいました――その詳細を記した小冊子の作成を自ら監督し、熱心な人のためになぞなぞまで用意したのも不思議ではありません。まるで私をここに導くために、彼が時代を超えて私に語りかけてきたかのような気持ちです！こんな…こんな光栄なことはありません」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: “来自德维恩本人的信息！”{n}他的眼睛亮了起来。{/n}“伟大的梦想家和愿景家！我早该猜到才对。德维恩对自己的构想充满了热情，也难怪他亲自监督这本小册子的创作，甚至还为那些富有洞察力的人设计了谜题。这种感觉就好像，他跨越了这么久的时光在与我对话，只是为了把我带到这里！我……我感觉像是被授予了莫大的荣誉。”
languages.original_text: "A message from Dewain himself!" {n}His eyes light up.{/n} "The great dreamer and visionary! I should have guessed. Dewain was passionate about his designs — it's no wonder he personally oversaw the creation of the booklet that described it and even included a puzzle for the keen-minded. It's as if he spoke to me through the ages back then just to lead me here! I... I feel I've been granted an honour."

traits.locale_text: “来自德维恩本人的信息！”{n}他的眼睛亮了起来。{/n}“伟大的梦想家和愿景家！我早该猜到才对。德维恩对自己的构想充满了热情，也难怪他亲自监督这本小册子的创作，甚至还为那些富有洞察力的人设计了谜题。这种感觉就好像，他跨越了这么久的时光在与我对话，只是为了把我带到这里！我……我感觉像是被授予了莫大的荣誉。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: «¡Un mensaje del mismísimo Dewain!». {n}Sus ojos se iluminan.{/n} «¡El gran soñador y visionario! Tendría que haberlo adivinado. Dewain sentía fervor por sus diseños; no me extraña que supervisara personalmente el libreto que los contenía y que llegara a incluir un acertijo para los más avispados. ¡Es como si me hablara siglos después para que viniera hasta aquí! Siento... como si me hubiesen concedido un honor».
languages.original_text: "A message from Dewain himself!" {n}His eyes light up.{/n} "The great dreamer and visionary! I should have guessed. Dewain was passionate about his designs — it's no wonder he personally oversaw the creation of the booklet that described it and even included a puzzle for the keen-minded. It's as if he spoke to me through the ages back then just to lead me here! I... I feel I've been granted an honour."

traits.locale_text: «¡Un mensaje del mismísimo Dewain!». {n}Sus ojos se iluminan.{/n} «¡El gran soñador y visionario! Tendría que haberlo adivinado. Dewain sentía fervor por sus diseños; no me extraña que supervisara personalmente el libreto que los contenía y que llegara a incluir un acertijo para los más avispados. ¡Es como si me hablara siglos después para que viniera hasta aquí! Siento... como si me hubiesen concedido un honor».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: « Un message de Dewain lui-même ! {n}s'exclame-t-il, les yeux brillants.{/n} Le grand rêveur, le visionnaire en personne ! J'aurais dû m'en douter. Dewain se passionnait pour ses projets architecturaux, il n'est donc pas étonnant qu'il ait supervisé personnellement la rédaction de cet opuscule, en y ajoutant une énigme pour les plus malins. C'est comme s'il m'avait parlé à travers les siècles pour me faire venir ici ! J'ai... l'impression qu'il m'a fait un grand honneur. »
languages.original_text: "A message from Dewain himself!" {n}His eyes light up.{/n} "The great dreamer and visionary! I should have guessed. Dewain was passionate about his designs — it's no wonder he personally oversaw the creation of the booklet that described it and even included a puzzle for the keen-minded. It's as if he spoke to me through the ages back then just to lead me here! I... I feel I've been granted an honour."

traits.locale_text: « Un message de Dewain lui-même ! {n}s'exclame-t-il, les yeux brillants.{/n} Le grand rêveur, le visionnaire en personne ! J'aurais dû m'en douter. Dewain se passionnait pour ses projets architecturaux, il n'est donc pas étonnant qu'il ait supervisé personnellement la rédaction de cet opuscule, en y ajoutant une énigme pour les plus malins. C'est comme s'il m'avait parlé à travers les siècles pour me faire venir ici ! J'ai... l'impression qu'il m'a fait un grand honneur. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: "Eine Nachricht von Dewain selbst!" {n}Seine Augen leuchten auf.{/n} "Der große Träumer und Visionär! Ich hätte es mir denken sollen. Dewain war voller Leidenschaft für seine Vorhaben – es ist kein Wunder, dass er selbst die Herstellung des Büchleins überwachte, in dem sie beschrieben waren, und für aufmerksame Leser sogar noch ein Rätsel hinzufügte. Als hätte er durch die Zeitalter zu mir gesprochen, nur um mich herzuführen! Ich ... ich habe das Gefühl, mir wurde eine große Ehre zuteil."
languages.original_text: "A message from Dewain himself!" {n}His eyes light up.{/n} "The great dreamer and visionary! I should have guessed. Dewain was passionate about his designs — it's no wonder he personally oversaw the creation of the booklet that described it and even included a puzzle for the keen-minded. It's as if he spoke to me through the ages back then just to lead me here! I... I feel I've been granted an honour."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Nachricht von Dewain selbst!" {n}Seine Augen leuchten auf.{/n} "Der große Träumer und Visionär! Ich hätte es mir denken sollen. Dewain war voller Leidenschaft für seine Vorhaben – es ist kein Wunder, dass er selbst die Herstellung des Büchleins überwachte, in dem sie beschrieben waren, und für aufmerksame Leser sogar noch ein Rätsel hinzufügte. Als hätte er durch die Zeitalter zu mir gesprochen, nur um mich herzuführen! Ich ... ich habe das Gefühl, mir wurde eine große Ehre zuteil."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: "Dewain'in ta kendisinden mesaj demek!" {n}Gözleri parlıyor.{/n} "Büyük hayalperest ve vizyoner! Dewain, tasarımları konusunda çok tutkuluydu. Onları anlatan kitapçığın yazımına bizzat karışmasına, hatta keskin zekâlılar için bulmaca bile eklemesine şaşmamalı. Sanki yüzlerce yıl öncesinden bana hitap edip beni buraya çağırmış! Bana... Bana büyük bir şeref bahşedilmiş gibi hissediyorum."
languages.original_text: "A message from Dewain himself!" {n}His eyes light up.{/n} "The great dreamer and visionary! I should have guessed. Dewain was passionate about his designs — it's no wonder he personally oversaw the creation of the booklet that described it and even included a puzzle for the keen-minded. It's as if he spoke to me through the ages back then just to lead me here! I... I feel I've been granted an honour."

traits.locale_text: "Dewain'in ta kendisinden bir mesaj demek!" {n}Gözleri parlıyor.{/n} "Amma büyük hayalperest ve vizyoner bir adammış! Dewain, tasarımları konusunda çok tutkuluymuş... Tasarımlarını anlatan kitapçığın yazılmasını bile bizzat yönetmesine, hatta keskin zekâlılar için bir bulmaca bile eklemesine şaşmamalı. Sanki yüzlerce yıl öncesinden bana hitap edip beni buraya çağırmış gibi! Sanki... Bana büyük bir şeref bahşedilmiş gibi hissediyorum."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian
